about_the_game:
Crush Them All, No Matter the Distance!


Ready to jump into the pilot seat? "Locust Hunter" is here to deliver non-stop action! This epic third-person flying shooter lets you command a legendary warship loaded with unlimited ammo and auto-repair. Punch through enemy armadas, dive into heart-pounding space battles, and annihilate those enemy ships! Your mission: go solo, get bloodied, and take down the dragon-like final boss "Locust"!

Heart-Pounding Gameplay:

"Locust Hunter" puts you in the driver's seat with third-person flying and shooting mechanics. You take on the role of the fearless "WHEEL" darting through enemy lines and clearing intense stages. Burn enemy missiles, dodge lethal attacks—this is a hardcore battle of wits and survival!

Epic Storyline:

  • WHEEL and NIGHT have broken free from “Locust's” grip. Now, it's their time to strike back. With WHEEL leading the charge, they'll blast through countless enemy barriers.
  • Battle in a digital realm where the stars, universe, and warships are imaginative constructs within cyberspace.

Features to Excite:

  • Stage Progression: Experience the nostalgic thrill of stage-based arcade play! Each level includes rest stops for full recovery and jaw-dropping CG cutscenes that keep you immersed and ready for the next big fight!
  • Strategy and Reflexes: Pick the best weapons and tactics based on enemy behavior. Use the devastating Arc Weapon at the right moment, and prioritize your targets wisely. Quick weapon swaps can turn the tide—every choice is critical! Observe keenly and move swiftly to find the narrow path to victory!
  • Missile Neutralization: Forget about rolling and dodging—use your laser to vaporize those incoming missiles straight away.
  • Stationary Evasion: Some enemies will try to ram you. Stay put and harness void energy to dodge damage effortlessly.
  • 3D Freedom: Move in any direction; enemy bombs will lay frozen, giving you the freedom to navigate and dodge skillfully.
  • Debris Explosion: Watch as enemy ships blow apart into fragments when attacked, creating a breathtaking zero-gravity shower of debris! Boss battles are equally stunning, with parts shattering all around!

Armory of Destruction:

"Locust Hunter" arms you with four devastating weapons:
  • Laser Cannon: Melt enemy missiles—perfect for attack and defense!
  • Arc Weapon: Delivers double the damage of lasers—unleash the beast!
  • Missile Launcher: Auto-lock and track enemy ships—there's no escaping!
  • Railgun: Twice as powerful and quick as missiles—obliterate enemy ships in a flash!

Variety of Foes and Behemoths:

  • Diverse Enemy Ships: Encounter 16 different types of small enemy ships, each with unique tactics like lasers, missiles, bombs, void bubbles, ramming, and more—stay sharp!
  • Mighty Bosses: Face off against three formidable bosses. On mobile bosses, target and destroy specific parts for tactical advantage. Boss attacks can speed up time and, depending on their damage, summon minions or launch special attacks—get ready for an adrenaline rush!

Step into the universe of "Locust Hunter" now, pilot the legendary warship, revel in the blood-soaked action, and harness your bravery and intellect to slay the dragon! The road is long and treacherous, but we'll crush every foe in our path! Ready to launch? Let's roll!

short_description: Though faraway, they shall be vanquished! "Locust Hunter" is a third-person, level-based space shooter game. Pilot WHEEL fights through Locust defenses with lasers, missiles, and more. Her ally, NIGHT, gathers parts for weapon upgrades. Enjoy unlimited ammo and regenerating armor—just push forward!

English*, Simplified Chinese
